product_name: CamelBak Podium Arc 2 Hydration Waist Belt - 20 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Podium Arc 2 Hydration waist belt holds 2 Podium Arc bottles close at hand so you stay hydrated on your next run. Waist belt includes two 10 fl. oz. bottles. Podium bottles feature the self-sealing JetValve(TM) caps that eliminate drips; JetValve caps let you sip from any direction or squirt to cool off on a hot day. Rip-and-stick closure with elastic webbing keeps bottles secure throughout the run. Zippered front pocket accommodates small items and energy snacks.
